# Circle of Wind (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Air Spells|air]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Oracle Spells|Oracle 1]], [[1st Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a crystal ring)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 145

Light winds encircle you, leaving you in the center of a mild vortex. You receive a +2 deflection bonus to AC against ranged attacks. You also receive a +4 bonus on saves against very hot conditions, including the negative impacts of mundane heat (see the Environment portion of the Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook), and saves against cloud vapors and gases (such as *[[Cloudkill (Spell)|cloudkill]], [[Stinking Cloud (Spell)|stinking cloud]],* and inhaled poisons). This spell does not function without air or underwater.
